txt.en: 'Well I say we must act or lose the moment.'
'Nay, friend, more men will be sent - and a new captain. This will pass.'
'I tell you, the flags are the key!'
'The meeting will take place, whether we pursue it or not.'
'The Captain bade us stay, Mulnír, not sit upon our hands and do nothing!'
'But if the rumours are true? What then?'
'Can you really just stand here and do nothing, Mulnír?'
'Knowing now how troubled this land is, I fear for Captain Lachír. Now we ought to find him.'
'A worry gnaws at my gut, Mulnír - that you were right and I was wrong.'
'All this time and the captain has still not returned. It bodes ill!'
